憛憛憛

憛字的基本解释

憛
tán
〔憛悇（
t?）〕a.贪爱，如“则虽王公大人有严志颉颃之行者，无不憛憛痒心而悦其色矣。”b.忧愁的样子。

憛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tán］
［《廣韻》他紺切，去勘，透。］
(1)忧苦悲伤。参见“悇憛”。
(2)爱好，贪图。参见“憛悇”、“憛憛”。

憛字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憛； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页403第03
【集韻】徒南切，音覃。憂意。　又【類篇】余廉切，音鹽。惶遽也。　又【集韻】於鹽切，音懕。【博雅】悇憛，懷憂也。　又【集韻】【韻會】?他紺切，音僋。【博雅】思也。一曰憛?，憂惑也。一曰遑遽也。一曰禍福未定意。　或作㤾。

憛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
憛字的起名意思

暂无。

Shame
Basic explanation of words
Shame
tán
〔憛悇(
t?)] a. Covetousness, such as "Although the princes have the rigorous ambitions, they are all tickle and pleased." b. The look of sorrow.
Shame
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tán］
["Guangyun" he cut, went to survey, and thoroughly. ]
(1) Sorrow and sorrow. See "Language".
(2) Hobbies, greed. See "憛悇", "憛憛".
Shame
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　憛; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 403 No. 03
[Jiyun] Tu Nanqie, Yintan. Worry.　[Classes] Yu Lianqie, Yinyan. Panic too.　[Jiyun] Yuyanqie, Yinyi. [Bo Ya] melancholy, worrying too.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? He is cut and sound. [Bo Ya] Think about it. One said, sorrowful. One said, not to mention. One said that misfortune and happiness are undecided.　或作㤾.
Shame
